nodes.text: The Obbic family was an elite Chiss family that was a member of the Nine Ruling Families of the Chiss Ascendancy's Aristocra. The Obbic family was allied with their fellow Ruling Mitth family.
Obbic'lia'nuf was a member of the Obbic family, who held the rank of Senior Commander within the Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet, serving aboard Admiral Ar'alani's Vigilant Nightdragon man-of-war.
